title: How can the advanced course teach you to induce ecstasy and enhance therapy?
first_phrase: This text explores the concept of ecstasy as a vertical movement and how it can be used in therapy. It provides seven points that can be worked on to create ecstasy, including movements on the spine and the use of music. The last 200 tokens examine advanced techniques taught in a course in Russia, including Taurus, a powerful induction technique that can induce deep hypnosis quickly. The text also describes Magnetic Ecstasy and Musical Ecstasy and provides exercises to induce ecstasy in front of a mirror. This section concludes with an exercise called "reconnecting earth and sky" that aims to bring the participant into a trance state.
content: Difference with classical somanmbulism: more spiritual sensations, less images MUSICAL ECSTASY Music will be felt differently and deeper in the state of ecstasy We will do a real musicotherapy Music will transmit suggestion Use slow music with a lot of high tones to increase ecstasy ========================================== We can also work ecstasy in front of a mirror Exercise with mirrors in pairs History: This exercise is from the "blue pearl" serie. In origin it was done without mirror Benefits: holding the "ball" 60 secs in front of the coccix will increase magnetism Goal of this exercise: activating ecstasy in front of the mirror and reinforce magnetism HOW TO DO IT One person will be in front and the other behind This exercise is for creating ecstasy in front of the mirror Have the person look into himself without blinking At a certain point have the person press the hands together as pressing a ball behind do passes on him and activating the points on the spine (occiput and coccyx) have the person breathing along the body as he/she does doing the charges ======================================== Additional exercise with a mirror Name of this Exercise: reconnecting earth and sky Go in front of a mirror. An assistant will be behind you. Look now at yourself without blinking This continous gazing will bring you in a trance.
last_phrase: In conclusion, these exercises and techniques presented here can be powerful tools for inducing spiritual sensations, creating ecstasy, increasing magnetism, and healing physical and emotional pain. The use of mirrors, music, magnetism, and non-verbal communication can facilitate deep somnambulism, regression, and past-life exploration. Additionally, the closure of the senses and the 10 plexuses technique are useful for creating a magnetic state, while the human pendulum test can stimulate unconscious answers. Finally, the fluidification technique, the use of magnetic points, and the DI PISA method can help in problem-solving and positive suggestions. With practice and confidence, these techniques can be applied to therapeutic or personal growth contexts.
